seo: Glassfish,任意文件读取漏洞,CVE-2017-1000028,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测Glassfish服务器是否存在CVE-2017-1000028任意文件读取漏洞，通过发送特定请求判断是否可以成功读取目标文件。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Glassfish server has the CVE-2017-1000028 arbitrary file read vulnerability by sending specific requests to determine if the target file can be successfully read.
